timeline.bodyText: sonar will probably flag this return in a void function. Is there a way to write the function without the return statement?

replies.bodyText: Hi @CrucisGamma so @antares1470 has been smashing through SQ rules so any assistance to keep code smells down is greatly appreciated. What i'll do is merge it into a temporary branch  to see what SQ has to say. SQ can't run on your fork.
